p: The antiviral effects of IFNs are expressed through activating interferon-stimulated genes (ISGs) ( 14). Additionally, by decreasing the vascular leakage, IFN Î²-1a improved ARDS complications, regardless of its antiviral properties ( 15). The higher expression of a protein named CD-73 also could lead to a better prognosis in ARDS. However, these data were not replicated in a later trial ( 16).
